about_the_game:
Overview:

Embark on a cosmic journey with ATOMIC TITANS, an action-packed casual combat game. Engage in heart-pounding showdowns within the confines of space faring arenas.

Across three elimination rounds, you’ll face off against up to 48 other combatants. Players will encounter randomized combinations of maps, weapon sets, and objectives to conquer.

Published by 2 Sodas, this game is poised to redefine how you experience action, competition, and camaraderie in the world of gaming.

Game Modes:

In this dynamic game, objectives vary to keep the action intense and exciting. Whether you're in the King of the Hill mode, racing against rival Titans to capture the coveted crown, or facing the challenge of Drones of the Hill, where killer drones heighten the stakes, your survival skills will be put to the test. Jackpot battle mode invites you to engage in fierce combat, seize cogs from your foes, and journey to the vault to score points, all while keeping an eye on your character's backpack to monitor your loot. Regardless of the mode, the ultimate aim remains the same – finish each round with enough points to secure victory.

Player Customization:

Your journey doesn't just involve brawn – it's about style too. Customize your Titan with a plethora of unique skins that reflect your personal flair. But appearances aren't the only thing you can tweak – pick from an impressive array of upgradeable weapons to truly tailor your Titan’s combat prowess. Let your emotions run wild with a range of entertaining emotes that let you express yourself in the heat of battle.
